mapper.select: SELECT account.emp_id AS emp_id, account.username AS username, pi.fname AS first_name, pi.mname AS middle_name, pi.lname AS last_name, reservation.note AS note, reservation.reg_date AS noted_at, reservation.seat_id AS seat_id FROM tbl_reservation AS reservation INNER JOIN tbl_user AS account ON reservation.emp_id = account.emp_id LEFT JOIN tbl_personal_info AS pi ON reservation.emp_id = pi.emp_id
